Source.Name: yubico-pam
Source.Description: The Yubico PAM module provides an easy way to integrate the Yubikey into your existing user authentication infrastructure. PAM is used by GNU/Linux, Solaris and Mac OS X for user authentication and by other specialized applications such as NCSA MyProxy.
